de.wagnst.tpe.exercise.crypter

  • Classes in de.wagnst.tpe.exercise.crypter used by de.wagnst.tpe.exercise.crypter 
    Class and Description
    CrypterVerfahren
    Enum which contains all possible crypters like xor, caesar and substition.
    IllegalKeyException
    Is thrown if the key does not match the key needed for encode/decode method
    IllegalMessageException
    Is thrown if the message to encode/decode does not match with the message given by user
  • Classes in de.wagnst.tpe.exercise.crypter used by de.wagnst.tpe.exercise.crypters 
    Class and Description
    Crypter
    Grundlegendes Interface, um Verschlüsselung durchzuführen.
    CrypterVerfahren
    Enum which contains all possible crypters like xor, caesar and substition.
    IllegalCrypterException
    Exception which can be thrown if an illegal crypter is used
  • Classes in de.wagnst.tpe.exercise.crypter used by de.wagnst.tpe.exercise.tests 
    Class and Description
    IllegalCrypterException
    Exception which can be thrown if an illegal crypter is used
    IllegalKeyException
    Is thrown if the key does not match the key needed for encode/decode method
    IllegalMessageException
    Is thrown if the message to encode/decode does not match with the message given by user
